main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on September 3, 1952, in Tucson, Arizona, described as elliptical with a bright glow.
interesting points: The object was reported to be approximately one-half the size of the moon., It was visible for about 3 to 5 minutes., The sighting was made by three persons, including George Fawcett and his daughter., Aircraft in the area were checked and none matched the object's description., The object exhibited tremendous speed during the observation.
sighted object: an elliptical object emitting a bright, pulsating glow
